original_text: And they spake unto Moses, saying, The people bring much more than enough for the service of the work, which the Lord commanded to make.
korean_text: 모세에게 말하여 이르되 백성이 너무 많이 가져오므로 여호와께서 명령하신 일에 쓰기에 남음이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: saying, The people bring much more than enough
for the service of the work
which the Lord commanded to make
